name: Prego® Porcupine Meatballs
author: Anonymous
summary: Rice-studded turkey meatballs simmer to tenderness in Prego® Traditional Italian Sauce.
ingredients: 2 cups cooked regular brown rice or regular long-grain white rice
¾ teaspoon dried oregano leaves, crushed
1 (26 ounce) jar Prego® Traditional Italian Sauce or Prego® Tomato, Basil & Garlic Sauce
directions: Thoroughly mix the turkey, rice, egg, oregano, garlic powder and black pepper in a large bowl
Shape the mixture firmly into 25 meatballs
Heat the sauce in a 12-inch skillet over medium heat
Add the meatballs and heat to a boil
Cover and cook for 10 minutes or until the meatballs are cooked through
